message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $12000. This is a high-quality item that has been valued at $15000 by other buyers, but I believe we can come to an agreement that suits both of us. Please let me know if this price works for you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on your product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider offers within $10000. Would you be willing to adjust your offer to meet this price point?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Given the value of the product, I am willing to negotiate at $11000. This still reflects the high quality of the item while allowing for a more reasonable agreement for both parties. Please let me know if this proposal is acceptable.
